00002 #define PedestalConstants_h 1
00003 
00004 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00005 #include <config.h>

00008 #include <cmath>
00009 #include "lcio.h"
00010 #include <LCHcalCalibrationObject.hh>
00011 
00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class PedestalConstants;
00017 
00025 class PedestalConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00029   PedestalConstants() {};
00030   
00031   PedestalConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error): _cutSignificance(3.0) {
00032     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00033     setCellKey(_cellId);
00034     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00035     obj()->setFloatVal(1, error);
00036   };
00037   
00038   PedestalConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj), _cutSignificance(3.0) {};
00039   
00040   virtual ~PedestalConstants() {};
00041 
00044   float getPedestalValue() const {
00045     return getFloatVal(0);
00046   };  
00047 
00050   float getPedestalError() const {  
00051     return getFloatVal(1);
00052   };
00053   
00056   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00057     return (float) (inputValue - getPedestalValue());
00058   };
00059   
00060   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00061     return (float) (outputValue + getPedestalValue());
00062   };
00063   
00066   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00067     return (float) (sqrt(pow(inputError,2)+pow(getPedestalError(),2)));
00068   };      
00069 
00072   bool calibrationValid() const {
00073     return (!std::isnan(getPedestalValue()));
00074   };
00075 
00078   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00079     return (resultValue - resultError*_cutSignificance > 0.);
00080   };    
00081 
00082   float getParam(unsigned paramIndex) {
00083     if (paramIndex==0) return _cutSignificance; 
00084     else {
00085       throw std::runtime_error("parameter index not valid");
00086     }  
00087   };
00088   
00089   void setParam(unsigned paramIndex, float paramValue) {
00090     if (paramIndex==0) _cutSignificance = paramValue;
00091     else {
00092       throw std::runtime_error("parameter index not valid");
00093     }
00094   };
00095 
00098   void print (std::ostream& os);
00099   
00102   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00103     return "PedestialConstants";
00104   };   
00105 
00108   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00109     return "i:CellKey,f:PedestalValue,f:PedestalError";
00110   };  
00111     
00112 protected:
00113   float _cutSignificance; 
00114     
00115 };
00116 
00117 }

00119 #endif
